text: The Hindi Wikipedia is the Hindi-language edition of Wikipedia. This edition started in July 2003. As of June 2018, it had over 125,000 articles.List of Wikipedias on Meta-Wiki. It is only Indian language Wikipedia with over 100,000 articles. ==References== ==Other websites== * Hindi Wikipedia main page Category:Wikipedias Category:Websites established in 2003
title: Hindi Wikipedia
